abstract: Houthi rebels in Yemen hit border town in Saudi Arabia with mortar and rocket fire, damaging buildings and leading the national airline to cancel flights to area.
lead_paragraph: Rebels in Yemen struck a border town in Saudi Arabia with mortar and rocket fire on Tuesday, damaging buildings and leading the national airline to cancel flights to the area.

headline.print_headline: Middle East; Saudi Arabia: Yemeni Rebels Attack

snippet: Rebels in Yemen struck a border town in Saudi Arabia with mortar and rocket fire on Tuesday, damaging buildings and leading the national airline to cancel flights to the area.
